entry.title: Entry #89 in Watkins v. Musk, 1:24-cv-11384
entry.summary: District Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered re 80 Motion for Reconsideration Seeking Dismissal Instead of Stay, or, in the Alternative, for an Order Certifying an Interlocutory Appeal of Arbitration Order. Plaintiffs' motion for reconsideration or an order certifying an interlocutory appeal under 28 U.S.C. ยง 1292(b) (Dkt. 80 ) is DENIED.(CGK)

entry.summary: District Judge Patti B. Saris: ORDER entered. ORDER of Administrative Stay/Closing. (CGK) (Entered: 06/12/2025)

entry.title: Entry #78 in Watkins v. Musk, 1:24-cv-11384
entry.summary: District Judge Patti B. Saris: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER entered. Musk's motions to dismiss for lack of standing (Dkt. 44 and 46 ) are ALLOWED as to the claims brought by Plaintiff Varsha Luthra and other wise DENIED. For the claims brought by the remaining plaintiffs, Musk's motion to compel arbitration of the claims against him individually (Dkt. 48 ) is ALLOWED, and those claims are STAYED. Mu sk's motion to dismiss the claims against him as trustee of the Musk Trust for lack of personal jurisdiction (Dkt. 46 ) is ALLOWED. The Court DENIES as moot Musk's motions todismiss for failure to state a claim (Dkts. 44 and 46 ).(CGK)
